description:
Description

Behavioral Science Solutions Ltd is the company behind the largest online behavioral science hub (BehavioralEconomics.com), which hosts the popular Behavioral Economics Guide, the Behavioral Economics Academy, and the Behavioral Economics Group.

In this role, you will work on our sponsorship initiatives, forging impactful partnerships and securing vital support to advance the leading publication for the behavioral economics and behavioral insights industry.

Responsibilities
• Identify, cultivate, and secure sponsorship opportunities
• Develop and nurture relationships with potential sponsors and partners
• Collaborate closely with management to align sponsorship efforts with strategic objectives

Requirements
• Bachelor’s degree or higher in social/behavioral science, business, or related field
• Minimum 5 years of professional experience
• Demonstrated understanding or affinity for behavioral science and its applications
• Proven track record in B2B sponsorship acquisition, marketing, or sales
• Ability to engage and manage high-level relationships
• Command of English language at native or bilingual level
• Excellent verbal and written communication skill

Additional Information

This is a part-time contract with performance-based compensation (commission only).
How to Apply

To be considered for this role, please email us.
